# Visualize & Communicate

This phase of the data life cycle involves developing products to visualize your data or analysis results ([Data Visualization](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/viz-comm/vis.html)) and/or communicate about your data and/or data products ([Data Communication](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/viz-comm/communicate.html)).
